description: Synthetic phosphopeptides and enriched K562 cell phosphopeptides were analyzed using a TripleTOF 6600 mass spectrometer before and after enzymatic dephosphorylation. Dephosphorylated peptides identified by X!Tandem database searching were subjected to spectral simulation of all possible single phosphorylations using SimPhospho software. Phosphopeptides were identified and localized by SpectraST searching against a library of the simulated spectra, and also by MaxQuant database searching.

terms.name: Reference
terms.value: Takai A, Tsubosaka T, Hirano Y, Hayakawa N, Tani F, Haapaniemi P, Suni V, Imanishi SY Optimization of TripleTOF spectral simulation and library searching for confident localization of phosphorylation sites. PLoS One. 2019;14(12):e0225885

title: Simulated spectral library searching on TripleTOF phosphopeptide datasets
